Class Country

    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.Country
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Country>

    public class Country
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Comparable<Country>
    Define class of a country The following is only base code, further features need to be added Note: 1. No arg in notifyObservers() call because view will refresh all the elements on "Country" node;

      • isValidDefender

        public boolean isValidDefender(int defenderDiceNum)
        Test if dice num is valid for a defender
        Parameters:
        defenderDiceNum - The number of dice that the defender choose
        Returns:
        If the dice is less than armies owned in the country, return true else return false

      • isValidAttacker

        public boolean isValidAttacker(int attackerDiceNum)
        Test if dice num is valid for a attacker
        Parameters:
        attackerDiceNum - The number of dice that the attacker choose
        Returns:
        If the dice is less than armies owned in the country, and more than 0, less than 3, return true else return false
